entry.title: A Segwit2x BIP
entry.summary: Sergio Demian Lerner has developed a BIP that matches the reference code published by the Segwit2x group. The BIP and code satisfy the requests of a large part of the Bitcoin community for a moderate increase in the Bitcoin non-witness block space, coupled with the activation of Segwit. The BIP draft can be found on GitHub through the provided link. The reference source was kindly provided by the Segwit2x group.
